headings: Foster learning and develop the potential of others.
Admission Requirements, Degree Plan and Courses
What Can You Do With a Curriculum and Instruction Degree?
Why Earn My Curriculum and Instruction Degree at Angelo State?
paragraphs: Our nationally-ranked curriculum and instruction program will teach you the necessary skills to develop engaging curriculum, design innovative instruction, coach learner development, evaluate program impact and promote professional development.
We offer three degree plan options to accommodate the many curriculum and instruction career path possibilities:
All of our courses are offered 100% online with 8-week terms, five times a year, allowing flexibility in planning around work and family schedules for degree completion.
Contact Information
Angelo State University is accredited by theTexas Education Agencyto recommend candidates for state educator initial certification and for additional certification.
Advanced Instructor

Our professional education option targets certified teachers who are seeking opportunities to teach dual credit courses at the high school level or teach their content at a community college or other two-year institution. You must complete 18 hours in your field in addition to the curriculum and instruction courses. Concentrations are available in:
Please note, some courses may run 16 weeks depending on your subject selection.

Our teacher studies program option targets those who are seeking the credentials to become a classroom teacher in the public, private and charter school setting. The Teacher Studies option is accredited by the Texas Education Agency (TEA).
Application and admission to the Educator Preparation Program (EPP) is a prerequisite for teacher certification.
Tuition & FeesWe don’t sacrifice quality for affordability. Angelo State is committed to helping you achieve your educational goals with as little debt as possible.

ASU Distinguished Graduate ScholarshipsEarn our premier graduate scholarship based on your highest degree GPA. Once you are admitted to an ASU graduate program, you will automatically be considered. No application is necessary.
General ScholarshipsWe offer over 600 different types of scholarships. You can apply for both our general scholarships and degree-specific scholarships with one application.
Your career path largely depends on what you specialize in. Regardless of the specialization chosen, you will be prepared to take the next step in your career immediately following graduation.

No matter which specialization you choose, our courses include active and experiential learning activities designed to prepare you for your post-graduation career. You will gain extensive experience through the application of theories and strategies, as well as through practical assessments.

Interaction with instructors and classmates is not only encouraged, but expected. Our faculty model and practice the theories and strategies taught, and you have the opportunity to connect with your classmates to fuel discussions. You can also join our student organizations for networking and professional development.
Contact our program advisor

Whether you’re pursuing a master’s degree, doctoral degree or certificate/certification, you have access to all the services in ourCollege of Graduate Studies and Research. You’ll find information and resources for everything from registering for classes and writing a thesis – to available graduate/teaching assistantships and graduate research opportunities.
If you want to go fast, go alone. But if you want to go far, go together.
